sense.def:
Kadar so ljudje ali živali
alive
je v njih življenje.

seg.quote: I think his father is still alive.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
alive
je zelo dejaven in uživa ob vsem, kar počne.

Dejavnost ali položaj, ki je
alive
obstaja ali deluje dobro.

seg.quote: Theatre outside London is very much alive.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki kraj
alive with something
je tam navzočih veliko ljudi ali stvari, tako da je videti živahen ali vznemirljiv.

seg.quote: The ditches beside the fields were alive with frogs.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
alive to a problem or situation
se tistega problema ali položaja zaveda in pozna njegovo pomembnost.

seg.quote: As you can see, I am fully alive to the problems facing the industry.

sense.def:
Kadar zgodba ali opis
comes alive
postane zanimiv, živahen ali realističen.

Kadar ljudje ali kraji
come alive
znova postanejo dejavni ali živahni.
